changelog:
- Healing New Version: claim button color picker (T4/T5/T6) in settings
  Bot waits for the configured color to appear before clicking Claim
  Use 'Screen' eyedropper (3-sec countdown) to pick the color in-game
- Healing settings: added '?' help button explaining each recorded position
- Fix: healing claim retry (up to 3 retries, 1s interval) if claim doesn't register
- Fix: client names with underscore/space now detected correctly
